invocations.description: Returns a creature pointer to the creature named name. If the creature was not found it returns an empty creature.
invocations.ex:
local cre = getcreature('Captain Fearless')
if cre.dist > 3 then
	reachcreature(cre.name)waitping()
end
invocations.exDescription: Will reach cre if it's distance is more than 3 SQM from you.
